key_responsibilities: Develop and drive a multi-channel communications strategy

key_responsibilities: Managing the Congressman’s agriculture, appropriations, energy, and natural resources priorities

requirements: Minimum of 1 year in a Congressional office

key_responsibilities: Serving as a member of the Congressman’s senior staff

key_responsibilities: Managing and executing the communications and digital media functions of the office
